# Locanara

> Free and open-source on-device AI SDK for iOS and Android

Privacy-first, unified on-device AI SDK for mobile developers. Build AI-powered apps without compromising user privacy. Licensed under AGPL-3.0.

## About

Locanara enables mobile developers to integrate AI features (summarization, classification, chat, translation, and more) using on-device processing. No cloud, no data collection, complete privacy. Includes Private RAG (document-based AI answers) and Personalization (AI that learns user preferences).

- iOS: Apple Intelligence (iOS 26+) + llama.cpp with GGUF models (iOS 17+)
- Android: Gemini Nano & ML Kit GenAI
- Web: Chrome Built-in AI

## Pricing

Free and open-source. No API keys, no usage limits, no per-request fees.

## Links

- Docs: https://locanara.com/docs

- Community: https://locanara.com/community
